name: TeshCorp
description:
At Tesh Corp we have worked extensively at developing technology and methodology that effectively addresses these issues. It’s called...
Splash! 
 
Throughout our 25+ years of software development experience working for the Top Software Worldwide Developers and building solutions for Top Fortune Companies, we have found that around 80% of the information systems have a similar structure: store, update, delete and report information. The other 20% is unique to each business.
We then created a software development Robot -Splash!- that takes as input the basic components of your business: products, customers, orders, transactions, vendors, employees, portfolios, ... you name it!
 
READ MORE...
